title: Li'l Lingo Can't Rhyme Tuba
description: Li’l Lingo eBooks create a fresh and colorful series for children. They are books children will want to read again and again. In this second book in the series, Li’l Lingo Can’t Rhyme Tuba, Lingo knows her instruments. As a master of rhyme, though, she cannot find an ample rhyme for tuba. Laugh out loud as you read this eBook and observe Li’l Lingo annoy her friends in her efforts. Who will come to her rescue?You will be delighted with Li’l Lingo eBooks. Offering excellent illustrations and text, they are a great way for children to enjoy learning rhyme along with a second language. Every book is written in English with Spanish alongside.
author: Jori Aguilar Sams
